Reviews.Title: “Bicycle rental service a +”
Reviews.Author: Cristian_Claudiu
Reviews.Content: hotel located directly opposite amsterdams central find coming schiphol airport anywhere else service friendly smile much appreciated smile cheap appreciated way face customer although place seem like maze many buildings actually quite well furnished coffee meeting rooms expresso kind top marks coffee room oldfashioned come 4star better meeting rooms hallways corridors nasty smell almost think caught upstairs well rooms though rooms adequately furnished although wifi advertised free actually get slow connection barely support bringing one let alone trying connect work one go back paying connection although unless pay totally unacceptable 2011 hotel 4 stars get bumped bottom list sightseeing amsterdam good gets business literally tons hotels around offering better facilities equal better price

Reviews.Title: “NH quality and a decent price”
Reviews.Author: jun8jim
Reviews.Content: stayed victoria park plaza one night really enjoyed hotel location cannot better service great made use room service menu room called get menu got delivered record time also order lady friendly efficient basic free internet works well would like faster connection awesome hotel check could go bit faster leisure guest time world would definitely make use hotel sleeping amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Never had such friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: intense2002uk
Reviews.Content: location hotel perfect hotel heart city 2 mins walk centraal stations ideal us used walk around take break hotel start room modern look amazing views canal

Reviews.Title: “Gem amongst the rough”
Reviews.Author: Kevin M
Reviews.Content: hotel right heart city center bang centraal station nice helpful people summer time price high still liked bar beautiful must drink kind

Reviews.Title: “Nice and efficient business hotel.”
Reviews.Author: indianguy
Reviews.Content: staff super friendly helpful make trip terrific location awesome close everything definitely come back

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms, a bit distant from the centre, terrible Internet access”
Reviews.Author: arturhoo
Reviews.Content: returned 5 days park plaza fabulous time first time amsterdam place stay location perfect everything within walking distance short tram ride concierge helpful giving us tips directions daily excursions everyone hotel staff polite friendly negative experiences ate buffet morning food fresh delicious hotel one block central station convenient catch train airport 7 euro big thank park plaza making vacation def stay next time

Reviews.Title: “Not for us”
Reviews.Author: SP MD 2
Reviews.Content: stayed weekend prior business meetings hotel well situated across road train station canal boats leave rooms hotel small least mine view roof lower floor enough space 1 person however imagine two people may find space little cramped breakfast busy arrived 930 sat morning find dining room packed people staff best keep buffet full clearly asked two fried eggs waitress kitchen busy would take 20 mins come 5 mins later ask would still like eggs however damage done given breakfast expensive 23 euros expect better service experience less like eating college cafeteria plenty small restaurants nearby serve food good half price would advise others try option paid 250 night priceline standard rate around night hotel alright 250 however would suggest lower end price value night would say definitely going disappointed receive hard money

Reviews.Title: “Shabby on the outside.........”
Reviews.Author: Duane D
Reviews.Content: wandered exhausted traveller stranded night amsterdam help offered airline moment walked felt completely cared wanted careful unexpected cost trip despite front desk obviously busy man happy show room also fine take bit time think friendly efficient id hard day without asking gave room price range know room ended much nicer one first shown wouldnt expect every time arriving late probably made possible still everybody would style service oldfashioned hotel taken trouble upgrade offering decor according contemporary expectations room plush comfortable classic way wellappointed appreciated extremely free internet hotels use opportunity make fast buck fast enough basic things another nice touch four different types plug desk international travellers ive lived amsterdam close particularly charming centraal damrak doesnt really appeal stag nights may appeal want wake somewhere feel like real quaint canal etc anyone holiday location couldnt better literally couple streets get tourist amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “What a wonderful place!!!”
Reviews.Author: GromitNorwich
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 days would definitely stay location perfect opposite station 5mins walk dam square minutes away bars coffee shops restaurants beds comfortable room bathroom clean modern breakfast buffet also nice selection continental dishes means american buffet job complaint would iron iron board room would expect 4 star even 3 star hotels seems pretty basic

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: gava100
Reviews.Content: stayed favorite hotel amsterdam us brand new room designer great job staff always friendly combination renovated rooms cant wait come back

Reviews.Title: “NH Tropen does the job”

Reviews.Content: rental service definitely plus arrived amsterdam car best way get around amsterdam rent one take tram city center well close even though saw bookingcom fee parking free dont know didnt ask wont find free parking amsterdam searched free internet public areas also plus works great ps visit big near amsterdam centraal station center largest public europe

Reviews.Title: “Thumbs up - Value, Location & Comfort”
Reviews.Author: BluePeppers
Reviews.Content: situated outside city center 25 minutes ride central station tram bus stop literally front hotel stop area nice quiet restaurants cafes grocery store couple bars across street outdoor market couple american also nearby next hotel one side tropen museum outside hotel looks like modern design early 80s outdated gate outside keycard required elevators seemed secure even though neighborhood appeared safe lobby nothing special front desk staff friendly spoke english well always greeted us helpful asked questions smoking rooms available upon request windows open doesnt get wireless internet access rooms daily charge around required 30 minutes free lobby upon request actually stayed two different smoking rooms 5 day stay rooms quiet clean hairdryer laptop sized safe coffee maker first room smaller enough room two twin beds pushed together desk wasnt uncomfortable wouldnt call spacious shower closet sink separate toilet two problems room first television didnt work importantly beds wheels didnt lock place properly bed kept called front desk sent someone fix within 15 minutes could switched rooms following morning second room larger bathroom normal bathtub shower hot water good pressure beds firm comfortable plenty closet space view museum pleasant look overall good room fair price hotel restaurant use secure baggage luggage scale lobby nh hotels generally known good service tropen lived reputation couple issues first room rest stay good would probably return recommend couples visit amsterdam want middle action happy travels

Reviews.Title: “Great business type hotel for leisure too....”
Reviews.Author: Evaking1
Reviews.Content: stayed nh tropen weekend could see amsterdam even though centre amsterdam easy tram ride almost like mini tour travelled world business leisure cant remember ever hotel every last staff welcoming time passed one would always say good little words dont cost anything often never used continental breakfast great lots choice meats cheese scrambled eggs bacon sausages first stay nh hotel even though booked friend works nh looked normal rate amsterdam hotel excellent value money

Reviews.Title: “Lovely!”
Reviews.Author: bizzykrizzy
Reviews.Content: stayed amsterdam past little beauty good prices online went easy get tram centraal quite area much pubs etc going get main areas tram stop really closeby taxi rank right outside got amazing room windows around views park city comfy bed offer pillow menu room lovely wooden floors great storage facilities reception professional try food etc would recommend certainly middle road hotel dam

Reviews.Title: “Be aware! They take money from your credit card without letting you know!”
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth_Masters
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 times always enjoyed efficient checkin checkout efficiency breakfast costs euros extra worth price rooms clean wifi access payment good bathrooms overall pleasant experience every time stay one drawback time takes get airport unless one taking taxi one take train schiphol amsterdam central tram get hotel

Reviews.Title: “A very good stay in a pleasant hotel.”
Reviews.Author: ChrisCorn
Reviews.Content: hotel looks recently refurbished staff kind bit distant city centre tram 9 stops front hotel takes quickly inner circle hotel provides good breakfast 18 euros biggest however wifi charged prices 5 euro half hour free wifi provided lobby ridiculously times 10 euro hostel starbucks provides free wifi shame hotel charge

Reviews.Title: “Taken for a ride”
Reviews.Author: CaitlinCoCorkEire
Reviews.Content: stayed nh tropen standard double room well outside inside looks old need updating front desk staff friendly checkin checkout went smoothly corner room extra person group rollaway bed set beds comfy breakfast hotel price pretty high several places within walking distance hotel breakfast dinner etc room looked clean however 2 group dust mold etc room shower stall several spots mold return nh tropen hotel

Reviews.Title: “Decent European Hotel but too far away.”

Reviews.Content: inside hotel bright airy welcoming staff helpfull great view city tram stop right outside hotel access city easy hotel little way walking distance zoo dont mind walking far enough city walk along canal get

Reviews.Content: hotel little way centre worry tram 9 stops right outside goes way central station also easy walk city reasonably staff helpful rooms well presented tidy kept clean use restaurant hotel breakfast 18 euros instead purchased slices cakes etc nearby went nearby coffee breakfast whilst watching people wonderful also good restaurant opposite hotel cafe museum seems mostly used locals wonderful food places eat get amsterdam would come hotel friendly bike tour took bikes really good three hours good local history fun trying bikes really easy ride cost 18 euros well worth go would definately go back bike hire

Reviews.Content: stayed nh tropen 4 nights paying first visit amsterdam hotel staff friendly helpful spoke excellent english room good size well appointed even though 9th floor never problem hanging around elevator bed comfortable hot water shower etc breakfast also good buffet style wide variety cereals breads meats cheeses fruits hot hotel located little way centre amsterdam 15 min walk public transport outside trams busses location isnt problem

Reviews.Content: central station amsterdam cost 25 euros get nh tropen amsterdam look map amsterdam hotel right next tropen museum however 1520 minute tram ride get city center far center amsterdam activity tourists think purchased room another website rather directly nh hotels website several amenities listed didnt exist breakfast though paid night breakfast additional 18 euros told booking another website breakfast even paid many guests booked directly though hotels website also free newspaper well internet additional euros 24 hours stores restaurants hotel area close early stay make sure eat city center get food bring back hotel hotel restaurant open breakfast 3 hours evening also listed hotel foam mattresses mattresses hard impossible sleep back much walking around amsterdam requires nice come back comfortable bed honestly think thin mattress cheap hostel would much comfortable room appointed however toilet literally former closet sink toilet closet smaller bathroom sink shower another sink another room also closet shower room also safe fit laptop computers valuables housekeeping apparently paid many rooms put disturb sign avoid room gone several hours returned sign turned around side saying please clean room housekeeping lady rushed room told please put disturb sign inside door would get paid cleaning room even though didnt clean room next day didnt put sign returned half used bar soap dropped floor left apparently housekeeper decided use toilet large toilet paper toilet waiting think travelers would much better either find hotel center city wait arrival find room even though busy time still rooms available everywhere much cheaper

Reviews.Title: “good hotel, more like a 4* in my opinion!”
Reviews.Author: iana_bucharest
Reviews.Content: stayed business staff friendly helpful went way advise public transport routes walking located next tropen museum doesnt look great outside inside nice spotlessly clean rooms modern room huge window view park across city tea coffee making facilities lots storage space wifi free lobby cost room bar nice atmosphere location good 1520 minute walk central station buses trams stop right outside dont fancy walk wouldnt bother breakfast number cafes bakeries within couple minutes walk overall would recommend hotel would stay

Reviews.Title: “Totally worth the money”
Reviews.Author: stefan_osterdahl
Reviews.Content: several days part business part weekend wife hotel nice clean good breakfast stuff try serve giving good feeling view room excellent tropen museum behind hotel theres beautiful park stuff tram 9 bus station directly front hotel tram 9 get center amsterdam main hotel theres good greek restaurant ask hotel stay two rooms one seperate bathroom inconvenient narrow second room one room shower wall close sink although im thin could managed yet could inconvenient

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”

Reviews.Title: “12 hour service means it”
Reviews.Author: Seat62A
Reviews.Content: nh tropen perfect 3 day stay amsterdam rooms comfortable always kept clean breakfast included booked good lots choice didnt much staff stay seen pleasent enough hotel situated main city centre right next lovely stay park looked stunning dam sq easily accessible number 9 tram stops right outside hotel takes 10 minutes although didnt spend much time hotel fantastic place come back busy day exploring

Reviews.Title: “Style over substance but the staff were keen to help...”
Reviews.Author: RobDan
Reviews.Content: although hotel located absolute center amsterdam well situated near beautiful park parking available building beautiful clean functional breakfast room nice great selection across street hotel tram line getting city problem five star hotel good services need personnel helpful guests varied tourists students etc good choice

Reviews.Title: “This place is great”
Reviews.Author: jirrupin
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights may sharing twin room friend room located top floor excellent view rooms quiet fairly large clean comfortable beds bathroom toilet separate rooms always bonus strange though location wardrobe bathroom location hotel real downside good walk 5mins tram ride city centre didnt bother us much didnt pay breakfast included eat hotel restuarant cant comment quality overall good value money prepared put short walk town beware paid front hotel lastminutecom apparently included taxes upon checkout charged extra per night city tax time writing still waiting response lastminutecom regarding issue

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: oupsss
Reviews.Content: came weekend explore city children enjoyed stay much parking included huge problem otherwise amsterdam personnel v friendly rooms large spotless breakfast excellent huge choice children particularly enjoyed chocolate toast would definitely stay recommend

Reviews.Title: “excellent .”
Reviews.Author: mclws3
Reviews.Content: tour group first leg trip loved room bathroom albeit small great amenities bedroom great comfortable breakfast top notch best hotels stayed trip took bus places one back problem amsterdam mornings kind cool

Reviews.Title: “Quite a disappointment”

Reviews.Content: friend stayed 3 nights birthday getaway really pleased rooms shown website modern hairdryer vanity mirror bathroom tv many english speaking channels extra cost also safe code entry extremely helpful polite gave go taxi firm cheapest rooms cleaned daily maids continental breakfast catered everyone hotel bar reasonably priced cheaper bars center tram stop directly outside hotel trams 9 14 going city center worth getting tram pass tourist information train station trams came every 8 minutes much standing around waiting opposite hotel small clothes shops supermarket large market hotel city centre sleep comfortably near enough ten minute tram ride

Reviews.Title: “Nice quiet location and very comfortable”

Reviews.Content: property business travel amsterdam ive stayed 2009 2010 friendly competent staff comfortable rooms nice breakfast adjacent museum tram stop front hotel within easy walking distance train station near enough action amsterdam nice quiet neighborhood

Reviews.Title: “great breakfasts!”
Reviews.Author: sammy dog67
Reviews.Content: thought knew nh hotels actually nice comfortable hotels booked nh tropen thought going excellent â€“ home page little change surprisingly however quite disappointed arrived reception staff friendly enough checkin easy look rather worn entering confirmed room quite small judging emergency exit door floor rather due heavy use brown colours much lighting also cold took time find hole tv set could reach thermostat turn heating colleague staying another room also met cold room heating cold room welcoming room twin beds large rather comfortable unlike hotel chains nh actually offers pillow menu giving choice number different types pillows nice feature even standard ones fine room seperate wc bathrooms small male would almost make mind use wc entering ensure entered room right way round appear heating wc hanging around reading newspaper bathroom also rather small tiny shower much water pressure shower fittings generally rather worn otherwise ok apart regular items found hotel bathrooms also extras like kit regular visitors even offered keep like shaving gel would worry airport hand baggage traveller actually quite good idea need one rather weird thing cupboard located inside bathroom tv set offered selection dutch tv channels plus international ones including bbc 1 2 major news channel like bbc world sky news cnn fact rather watching tv might simply want enjoy view 9th floor view fantastic surprisingly even 9th floor quite lot traffic noise noise would come trams tram line 9 operating outside hotel taking straight centre amsterdam including central station shuttle buses operated airport travelling public transport place conveniently located parking available though extra price spaces finally would say quite disappointed everything extra high cost rather limited parking charge fair enough incredibly dull breakfast ripoff instead breakfast hotel find cafe similar somewhere else â€“ likely cheaper better internet access also extra offered rate one 24 hours many hotels offering service free really appalling

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, quiet, convenient”
